text: Shikanyala okhuba mbu Omundu wahebwa nende Nyasaye eshitabu nende amachesi nende oburumwa mana aboolele Abandu mbu; â€œmunaame esie abundu wokhulaama Nyasaye; Halali ababoolela mbu, mube bokhulaama Nyasaye wenyu Omulesi webindu biosi shichila enywe mwechesinjia eshitabu neshichila mushisomanga
